item.title: Hugo adds unnecessary whitespace after a link
item.description: I’m running this blog with Hugo. I love it because it’s super fast and functional, but I had a problem. Issue example This is [test](https://example.com), just a [sample](https://sample.test) This would output… like this. It rendered unnecessary space before comma or period. Cause It was because layouts/_default/_markup/render-link.html ended with a newline.
